import React from 'react'; const { signup } = require('../services/auth'); class Signup extends React.Component { state = { username: '', email: '', password: '', message: '', }; onChangeHandler = (ev) => { this.setState({ [ev.target.name]: ev.target.value, }); }; onSubmitHandler = (ev) => { ev.preventDefault(); signup(this.state.username, this.state.email, this.state.password).then((user) => { if (user.message) { this.setState({ message: user.message, username: '', email: '', password: '', }); } else { this.props.setUser(user); this.props.history.push('/login'); } }); }; render() { return (
{/* */}

); } } export default Signup;
